alert.note: Alert for Northern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 3:56PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Herkimer County through 430 PM EDT... At 354 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Star Lake, or 22 miles north of Old Forge, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Herkimer County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm. Rainfall rates of up to 1 inch per hour is possible.
